rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with low threshold and open layout to facilitate easy navigation.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area adjacent to the garden, designed for wheelchair accessibility with wide door openings and minimal level changes.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Separate dining space near the kitchen with low counters and easy access.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible kitchen with lower countertops, pull-out cabinets, and adequate maneuvering space.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy master bedroom designed for ease of mobility; includes a wheelchair-accessible bathroom en suite.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Accessible guest bathroom with grab bars and low sinks.

openings.specifications: Large, double-glazed windows for natural light and ventilation.
Wide doorway with easy threshold for wheelchair movement.
